features: PEEK-A-BOO JJ: It’s time to play Peek-A-Boo with CoComelon’s JJ! JJ hides behind a star plush and magically reappears to surprise your little one
SOUNDS AND PHRASES: Peek-A-Boo JJ features 17 sounds and phrases
SING & PLAY: Join the fun and sing along with JJ to the CoComelon hit song, “Peek a Boo”
COLLECT THEM ALL: Bring the excitement of the popular show CoComelon into your home with toys, plush, vehicles, and much more
body.description: “Peek-a-Boo… I see you!” It’s time to play every little one’s favorite playtime game with Peek-A-Boo JJ! Press the star on JJ’s foot to start the fun and sing along to a clip of the fan-favorite song, “Peek a Boo”! Peek-A-Boo JJ combines motorized movements with 17 sounds and phrases to keep your little one entertained and engaged! JJ is dressed in adorable whale pajamas and hides behind a plush star. JJ says, “Peek-a-Boo” when he reveals his face! Peek-A-Boo JJ is inspired by the hit show and makes the perfect gift for every CoComelon fan. Your little one will love playing and singing with CoComelon’s Peek-A-Boo JJ Feature Plush!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About CoComelon Join JJ and his family and friends in the animated world of CoComelon! Whether at preschool with his friends, at home with YoYo and TomTom, or on adventures with his animal friends, JJ invites kids and parents to watch and sing along together! CoComelon: Where kids can be happy and smart! CoComelon Peek-A-Boo JJ with Sounds and Phrases “Peek-a-Boo…I see you!” It’s time to play every little one’s favorite game with Peek-A-Boo JJ! Press the star on JJ’s foot to start the fun and sing along to a clip of the fan-favorite, “Peek a Boo”! Peek-A-Boo JJ combines motorize movements with 17 sounds and phrases to keep your little one entertained and engaged! JJ hides behind the star plush and then says “Peek-a-boo” when he reveals his face! Peek-A-Boo JJ is inspired by the hit show and makes the perfect gift for every CoComelon fan! Play your little one’s favorite game, Peek-A-Boo, with CoComelon’s Peek-A-Boo JJ! JJ plays an interactive game of Peek-A-Boo by combining motorized movements with 17 sounds and phrases Sing with JJ to a clip of the fan favorite “Peek a Boo” song! Peek-A-Boo JJ is suitable for ages 18 months and up. Three AA batteries are included. Collect other CoComelon toys, plush, books, instruments, and more!

Peek-A-Boo Play your little one’s favorite game, Peek-A-Boo, with CoComelon’s Peek-A-Boo JJ. JJ lifts and lowers his arms to cover his face with the star plush for an interactive game of Peek-A-Boo! Bring CoComelon Home Bring the CoComelon experience to your home with a wide range of toys, plush, musical instruments, and much more! 17 Sounds and Phrases Peek-A-Boo JJ is the perfect companion for your little one’s playtime! Press the star on JJ’s foot to start the fun and keep your little one engaged with their favorite character! JJ says playful phrases like “Peek-A-Boo, I see you!” to encourage others to join. Peek-A-Boo JJ also plays a fan-favorite clip of the “Peek a Boo” song!

About Jazwares Jazwares, a subsidiary of Alleghany Capital Corporation, specializes in consumer products including toys, plush, action figures, collectibles and musical instruments. Jazwares’ portfolio includes a variety of dynamic licensed and wholly owned brands. With over 20 years of design, development, and manufacturing experience, Jazwares is a company with a progressive focus on identifying new trends and transforming them into high-quality products for consumers of all ages. Jazwares, which is headquartered in Sunrise, FL, has offices around the world and sells in over 100 countries. Since its inception in 1997, Jazwares continues to grow through the development of new products and the strategic acquisitions of companies like First Act, Russ Berrie, Zag Toys, Wicked Cool Toys and Kellytoy.
